title: Swordsman of the Northern Kingdom (1C117)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a ranger strength +2 (or +4 when skirmishing a roaming minion).
Lore:	”'This is no mere Ranger. He is Aragorn, son of Arathorn … and you owe him your allegiance.'”
Rarity:	C
